mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.login_name AS "user.loginName", a.title AS "title", a.signature AS "signature", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.login_name = a.login_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tsignature_lib( id, login_name, title, signature, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.loginName}, #{title}, #{signature}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tsignature_lib SET title = #{title}, signature = #{signature}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE login_name = #{user.loginName}
